text: “Ndipo (pamene adafika kwa Yûsuf), (iye) adawakweza makolo ake ndikuwaika pa chimpando (chake) chachifumu, ndipo onse adagwa kumlambira (monga mwachizolowezi chawo nthawi imeneyo). Ndipo (Yûsuf) adati: “E inu bambo wanga! Ili ndilo tanthauzo (lenileni) la maloto anga akale. Palibe chipeneko Mbuye wanga wawatsimikiza (malotowo). Ndipo adandichitira zabwino ponditulutsa kundende ndi pokubweretsani inu kuchokera kumidzi (Kenani), pambuyo pokhwirizira (chidani) satana pakati pa ine ndi abale anga. Ndithudi Mbuye wanga amadziwa kwambiri chinsinsi cha zomwe wakonza kuti zichitike. Ndithu Iye Ngodziwa, Ngwanzeru
